SEARCH
Package project332

Class Book

java.lang.Object
project332.Book
Direct Known Subclasses:
EBook, PhysicalBorrowableBook, PhysicalNonBorrowableBook
public abstract class Book extends Object
Abstract base class representing a book in the library system. This class can be extended to implement specific behaviors for different types of books.

      title - the title of the book
      author - the author of the book
      isbn - the unique ISBN of the book
      genre - the genre of the book
      description - a brief description of the book
